Donation(address,uint256).details: Emitted when native tokens are donated to the contract.

params.amount: The amount of native tokens donated.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

ReceivedTransferRemote(uint32,bytes32,ui.details: Emitted on `_handle` when a transfer message is processed.

params.amount: The amount of tokens received from the remote sender.
params.origin: The identifier of the origin chain.
params.recipient: The address of the recipient on the destination chain.

SentTransferRemote(uint32,bytes32,uint25.details: Emitted on `transferRemote` when a transfer message is dispatched.

params.amount: The amount of tokens sent in to the remote recipient.
params.destination: The identifier of the destination chain.
params.recipient: The address of the recipient on the destination chain.

params._domain: The domain of the remote Application Router
params._router: The address of the remote Application Router

params._addresses: The addresses of the remote Application Routers
params._domains: The domains of the remote Application Routers

params._destinationDomainId: The Hyperlane domain ID of the destination chain.
params._nftSalePrice: The NFT sale price in Wei.

initiateCrossChainNftPurchase(bytes32).details: Entry point for a cross-chain NFT purchase.     NOTE: `msg.value` will be greater than `nftSalePrice`, since it includes funds to cover cross-chain gas payment.        The post-dispatch IGP hook handles cross-chain gas payment errors, so there is no need to check here if the user has supplied        sufficient cross-chain gas funds.

params._recipient: The address of the recipient on the destination chain; this MUST be the user's address on the destination chain.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns._0: _gasPayment Payment computed by the registered InterchainGasPaymaster.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

routers(uint32).details: Returns 0 address if no router is enrolled for the given domain

returns._0: router The address of the Router contract for the given domain

params._hook: The address of the hook contract.

params._module: The address of the interchain security module contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._domain: The domain of the remote Application Router

params._domains: The domains of the remote Application Routers

enrollRemoteRouter(uint32,bytes32).notice: Register the address of a Router contract for the same Application on a remote chain

quoteGasPayment(uint32).notice: Returns the gas payment required to dispatch a message to the given domain's router.

routers(uint32).notice: Returns the address of the Router contract for the given domain

setDestinationGas((uint32,uint256)[]).notice: Sets the gas amount dispatched for each configured domain.

setDestinationGas(uint32,uint256).notice: Sets the gas amount dispatched for each configured domain.

setHook(address).notice: Sets the address of the application's custom hook.

setInterchainSecurityModule(address).notice: Sets the address of the application's custom interchain security module.
